channel.title: Bug Help Please
channel.description:
Hello, I am currently working on my first server ever. I am using PimpScape as my source. I just added Jagex items to my server and changed the "Pickup" command to work with Jagex items. Now the problem im having is when I spawn a Jagex item like a skillcape, I can wear it but when I take it off it turns into boots with the ID (9999). If you have any idea of what may be causing this, I will appreciate the help very much.
Thank You
Legends PK

item.title: Bug Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Legends_PK Legends PK
item.description:
@Legends_PK wrote:

Ok, if you figure it out can you tell me? Thanks im working on it also if I figure it out ill tell you right away.

Read full topic

Legends PK[/quote]I have the same problem, but the items turn into watering cans, id: 11999 instead of boots.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Legend_Fate Legend Fate
item.description:
@Legend_Fate wrote:

Try looking at other servers Pickup commands and compare it to yours.

Read full topic
